title: SosSpagetti
author: SosSpagetti
content: We need a moderator for discord and telegram in Turkish, Korean and Japanese language. We need someone who can moderate both groups at the same time.12 hour shifts/day 7 days a weekAvailable hoursUTC+2 :A) 7am-7pmor B) 7pm-7amIt starts tomorrow.Project: memecoinAll details here DM or tg @maxmerissIf you can speak English, please contact me in English.

comments.author: SosSpagetti
comments.body: UpdateNow we only need Japanese moderators
